text:
Hey food tubers, Jamie and I are gonna show you
how to make a delicious barbecue sauce
That's great for all meats, but totally perfect for my awesome, rad Rum Ribs Recipe
Ok so Jamie, I want you to peel some ginger
How much?
I want a thumbs worth, not your thumbs, because you got stupidly big thumbs
I want one of my thumbs worth, about 4cm of ginger
I want you to peel it
Show me your thumb...
Jheez look at those things
You've got like a hobbit thumb
That's a really gnarly hobbit thumb
Okay so Frodo, what are we doing next?
So, my bad, now we're gonna do three cloves of garlic
So I want you to basically smash and bash those guys
How do you turn this bad boy on?
Is it those Hobbit fingers?
Damn Hobbit fingers man...DAMN YOU HOBBIT FINGERS
It's on...ok cool
A little bit of water in there... get in there
For all the folks, could you just whack everything in a liquidiser and waz it all up?
Yeah you can yeah

next up we're gonna go with cider
vinegar, three big tablespoons of that
Then we want 125ml of ketchup
Do you wana add the rum...Yeah
60ml of Rum
When you're cooking alcohol in a sauce like this, there's no alcohol left guys...
I mean you've just cooked all the alcohol away, you're just left with that kinda
barrelly, bourbony you know all those flavours
You've got the nutmegs and the vanillas and all these beautiful kinda exotic
Citrussy sort of fruity
That's it and all that just goes straight into that sauce and assists the next layer of flavour
and by the way, we've done a cocktail for these ribs. Made from the same Rum that we've used in this recipe
Then click on the link below on Drinks Tube
Now we're gonna do Worcester sauce... One tablespoon of that stuff.
I just slapped your arse making this sauce and you didn't even say a word
Because you didn't say GOOD GAME STEVENSON, GOOD GAME!
you gotta pretend we're in a locker room, GOOD GAME, say it...
Good game Stevenson!
here we go...you gotta do it...
WOO, good game Oliver, WOO
50 grams of dark brown sugar
So we're gonna go with two big heaping tablespoons
correct, yeah 50 grams
One and two

then I wana, yeah a teaspoon of Dijon
mustard
and then I want you to add a teaspoon of chili flakes
You can go tablespoon, we're gonna go with a teaspoon
I like my things spicy and I know Jamie likes spicy food
Cook that for 20-30 minutes yeah

You want it to be the right consistency
of gloop
Until sort of like shiny and thick and gorgeous.
Ok there is your beautiful sauce, you wana cook that for at least 20 minutes, on a low temperature.
So i've got, this is basically what that glaze looks like
You can see it's a good glaze because it's sticking to my finger...you know, and it don't wana come off
So... sorry
But it's good...
It is a good sauce
